response.original_title: All for Nothing: The Life and Death of Bruno Bronn
response.overview: Bruno Bronn was a well-known figure in the Cape Town gay community, running one of the most popular bars. Following the death of his long-term partner, he suffered from depression, but a few years later began a new relationship. After expressing anxiety about his partner's mental state, Bronn was found strangled in his home, and speculation about a hidden fortune in the home was raised. We unravel the truth of this dramatic crime.
response.title: All for Nothing: The Life and Death of Bruno Bronn
